     # File lib/localization_simplified.rb, line 143
143:       def number_to_currency(number, options = {})
144:         # Blend default options with localized currency options
145:         options.reverse_merge!(LocalizationSimplified::NumberHelper::CurrencyOptions)
146:         options[:order] ||= [:unit, :number]
147:         options = options.stringify_keys
148:         precision, unit, separator, delimiter = options.delete("precision") { 2 }, options.delete("unit") { "$" }, options.delete("separator") { "." }, options.delete("delimiter") { "," }
149:         separator = "" unless precision > 0
150: 
151:         #add leading space before trailing unit
152:         unit = " " + unit if options["order"] == [:number, :unit]
153:         output = ''
154:         begin
155:           options["order"].each do |param|
156:             case param
157:               when :unit
158:                 output << unit
159:               when :number
160:                 parts = number_with_precision(number, precision).split('.')
161:                 output << number_with_delimiter(parts[0], delimiter) + separator + parts[1].to_s
162:             end
163:           end
164:         rescue
165:           output = number
166:         end
167:         output
168:       end
